page.title: 14CHURCHES AND CHAPELS
page.content: Within our area there are two Church of England Churches and a Methodist Chapel. The Churches and the Chapel are well attended at each service and each has quite a thriving Sunday School for the children to attend. Going to church does not play an important part in the lives of most people in our area although many people do believe in a God and they follow a Christian way of tradition by getting married in a Church or by having their children Baptised, even though they might never go to church. This is due more to a Tradition of such events rather than actually receiving 'God's blessing'. Religion in the area is not strong and is dominated by the Christian belief. The congregations at the services are made up of a cross section of ages, but mainly women.
